author: LondonIsBluePodcast
title: Can Conte Tarnish Burnley’s Home Form?
text: ✕ Can Conte Tarnish Burnley’s Home Form? London is Blue Podcast ropes Simon Johnson from the Evening Standard in to preview the Burnley match coming up this weekend. Photo by Clive Mason/Getty Images London is Blue are... Special Guest: Simon Johnson, Evening Standard, @sjstandardsport Listen In Episode Summary Back for a midweek special, we are rejoined by Simon Johnson of the Evening Standard to talk about the match this weekend and Burnley’s unbelievable home form. We also answered some social media questions from you! Housekeeping Leave us an iTunes review ! We love connecting with more Chelsea listeners from around the globe, and this is on the best ways for us to reach more of them! Thanks to those who left them from last week: Rob McNew! How to Listen
